maintenance_metrics.version_release_cadence: Positive - at least one new version in past 12 months
maintenance_metrics.community_interaction: Active - regular PR and issue interactions

recommendations: Express is a highly recommended package for Node.js web applications
Excellent security posture with no known vulnerabilities in current versions
Strong community support and active maintenance
Consider staying on the latest stable version (v5.1.0) for best security
Monitor for updates as the project is actively maintained

security_assessment.rationale: No known security issues in current versions. Historical vulnerabilities in v3.x have been resolved. MIT license is permissive and safe. Security policy is in place.

popularity_assessment.rationale: Exceptional popularity with 47M+ weekly downloads. Classified as 'Key ecosystem project'. Top 5% usage ranking. Strong GitHub metrics with 67K+ stars.

maintenance_assessment.rationale: Sustainable maintenance with recent commits (8 days ago). Last release 5 months ago is reasonable for a mature project. Active community with 105 open issues and 88 PRs.

community_assessment.rationale: Active community with 310 contributors. Strong GitHub presence. Good documentation and examples available.

risk_factors: Mature project with slower release cycles - not necessarily a negative
High number of open issues (105) but proportional to project size and popularity
summary: Express is a healthy, well-maintained package that is safe to use in production applications. It demonstrates excellent security practices, massive popularity, sustainable maintenance, and an active community. The package is a cornerstone of the Node.js ecosystem and continues to be actively developed and supported.
